content.rendered:
Employment Opportunities

For additional employment opportunities, please check below.

Openings at this time:

  • Administrative
  • Professional/Instructional/Certified
  • Professional/Non-Instructional
  • Coaches/Sponsors/Volunteers
  • Substitute Teachers
  • Support

Bus Driver Pay:
Route Pay: $52/each route
Activity Pay:  $21/Hr for driving to/from and during the event.

Applications period open until filled.

Please download and complete the necessary employment application below:

S-O Licensed Staff Application
S-O Support Staff Application

Send or email application information to:

Mr. Stan De Zeeuw
S-O Superintendent of Schools
120 11th Ave NE
Sibley, IA 51249
stan.dezeeuw@thegenerals.org
712-754-2533

EOE
It is the policy of the Sibley-Ocheyedan Community School District not to illegally discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, gender, disability, religion, creed, age (for employment), marital status (for programs), sexual orientation, gender identity and socioeconomic status (for programs) in its educational programs and its employment practices.  There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination.  If you have questions or a grievance related to this policy please contact the district’s Equity Coordinator, Jillian Klingenberg, HS Guidance Counselor,  Sibley-Ocheyedan CSD 120 11th Ave. NE, Sibley, IA  51249, 712-754-3601, Email: Jillian Klingenberg jillian.klingenberg@thegenerals.org.
